Incandescent Strike.name: Incandescent Strike
Incandescent Strike.flavor: When you strike, intense light pours from your weapon, leaching all color from the area and blinding your foe.
Incandescent Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Incandescent Strike.effect: Each enemy within 3 squares of you takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Perfect Incandescence.name: Perfect Incandescence
Perfect Incandescence.flavor: As you attack, your soulâ€™s perfection spills forth, transforming you into a being of pure radiance.
Perfect Incandescence.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Perfect Incandescence.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).
Perfect Incandescence.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).
Perfect Incandescence.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you are insubstantial and gain fly 8 (hover). You emit light from your Incandescent Presence feature out to a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 3).

Unbearable Countenance.name: Unbearable Countenance
Unbearable Countenance.flavor: The perfection of your soul burns so brightly that your terrified enemies cannot bear to look upon you.
Unbearable Countenance.effect: Until the end of the encounter, any enemy that makes an attack that includes you as a target takes a -2 penalty to its attack rolls for that attack.
